name: memes 2 DLC: we all cry++
description:
Memes 2 DLC++. Pretty self explanatory, download the version most suited to your device. On android the key doesn't always unlock even if you have beaten Memes 2, so try the keyless versions.
Arm64-v8a works on newer android devices, armeabi-v7a for older ones, and the x86-64 works on the simulator and chromebooks. Universal works everywhere but is larger. Rest are pc (windows), mac and linux.
